Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_BIOHOJACDET WHERE BIOHOJACCODI=: BIOHOJACCODI AND IND_DEL= :IND_DEL ORDER BY BIOHOJACCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_BIOHOJACDET ( DETABIOHCCODI, BIOHOJACCODI, DATACATCODI, ANIO, TRIMESTRE, VALOR, USU_CREACION, IND_DEL, FEC_CREACION ) VALUES ( :DETABIOHCCODI, :BIOHOJACCODI, :DATACATCODI, :ANIO, :TRIMESTRE, :VALOR, :USU_CREACION, :IND_DEL, :FEC_CREACION )

UPDATE CAM_BIOHOJACDET SET BIOHOJACCODI = :BIOHOJACCODI, DATACATCODI = :DATACATCODI, ANIO = :ANIO, TRIMESTRE = :TRIMESTRE, VALOR = :VALOR, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, WHERE DETABIOHCCODI = :DETABIOHCCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_BIOHOJACDET ORDER BY DETABIOHCCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_BIOHOJACDET SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE BIOHOJACCODI IN (SELECT BIOHOJACCODI FROM CAM_BIOHOJAC WHERE PROYCODI=:PROYCODI AND IND_DEL='0' ) AND IND_DEL='0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_BIOHOJACDET WHERE DETABIOHCCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
